Financial risk management objectives and policies

The Group does not have written risk management policies and guidelines. The Directors of the Company meet periodically to analyse and formulate measurements to manage the Group's exposure to market risk (including foreign exchange risk and interest rate risk), credit risk and liquidity risk. The Group does not hold or issue derivative financial instruments for hedging or speculative purposes. There has been no change during the financial year to the Group's exposure to these financial risks or the manner in which it manages and measures the risk.
